com.vais.controllers

Class CarController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vais.controllers.CarController

  • @Controller
 @Transactional
 @SessionAttributes(value="role")
public class CarController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Eduard , this controller is responsible for manipulations with car entity in database via Hibernate, from front end layer.

    • Method Detail

      • getCars

        @RequestMapping(value="/cars",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.ui.Model getCars(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                         org.springframework.ui.ModelMap modelMap)
        on request connects to database and pulls out list of cars . Retrieved data is exposed via spring model
        Parameters:
        model - spring Model that used to input parameters for client response
        modelMap - required to check user access modifier
        Returns:
        spring UI model with List of cars in it

      • getCar

        @RequestMapping(value="/cars/{carId}",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String getCar(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap modelMap,
                                                                                                    org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                    @PathVariable
                                                                                                    java.lang.Long carId)
        on request connects to database and pulls out specified(by path variable) car entity . Retrieved data is exposed via spring model
        Parameters:
        modelMap - required to check user access modifier
        model - UI model from spring
        carId - path variable that indicates which car should be retrieved from database
        Returns:
        redirect link

      • changeCar

        @RequestMapping(value="/cars/{carId}",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String changeCar(@RequestParam
                                                                                                        java.lang.String model,
                                                                                                        @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                        java.lang.String mark,
                                                                                                        @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                        java.lang.String carClass,
                                                                                                        @RequestParam(defaultValue="0",required=false)
                                                                                                        int carCost,
                                                                                                        @PathVariable
                                                                                                        java.lang.Long carId,
                                                                                                        org.springframework.ui.ModelMap modelMap)
        this method updates car in database . Update is made based on request parameters
        Parameters:
        model - of car entity
        mark - of car entity
        carClass - of car entity
        carCost - of car entity
        carId - of car entity
        modelMap - required to check user access modifier
        Returns:
        redirect link

      • addCar

        @RequestMapping(value="/cars",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String addCar(@RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                             java.lang.String carName,
                                                                                             @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                             java.lang.String mark,
                                                                                             @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                             java.lang.String carClass,
                                                                                             @RequestParam(defaultValue="0",required=false)
                                                                                             int carCost,
                                                                                             org.springframework.ui.ModelMap modelMap)
        adds new car into database by calling method from hibernate data access repository and using parameters received from request
        Parameters:
        carName - model of car entity received from request
        mark - of car entity received from request
        carClass - of car entity received from request
        carCost - of car entity received from request
        modelMap - spring ModelMap class
        Returns:
        redirect link to managerCars page or to home page if role doesn't match "manager"

      • deleteCar

        @RequestMapping(value="/cars/delete/{carId}")
public java.lang.String deleteCar(@PathVariable
                                                                                 java.lang.Long carId,
                                                                                 org.springframework.ui.ModelMap modelMap)
        deletes defined car , access to delete a car has only manager
        Parameters:
        carId - of car entity received from request
        modelMap - spring ModelMap class
        Returns:
        redirect link to managerCars page or to home page if role doesn't match "manager"
